Package emissary.util

Class CounterSet

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
java.util.HashMap<String,Integer>
emissary.util.CounterSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Map<String,Integer>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CharacterCounterSet
public class CounterSet extends HashMap<String,Integer>
A set of named counters that can be easily incremented
See Also:
